p: In the European Region, Italy counted 9172 cases; thus it was the second country with the most cases after China. France, Germany and Spain reported 1402, 1139 and 1024 cases, respectively, while another 44 countries reported < 400 cases [ 23]. In the Eastern Mediterranean Region, Iran was the country with the highest number of cases (7161) [ 23]. In the USA, 472 cases were reported [ 23].
